unpublishedAction.name: Query1

actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT apple.publicidentifier,apple.firstName,apple.lastName, apple.phoneNumber,apple.email as "Candidate Email",apple.location,apple.companies,apple.educations,apple.headline,apple.summary,
apple.score,apple.relevantExperience, users.uid as "Scout ID",users.firstname as "Scout FirstName", users.email as "Scout Email", apple.forecastedCluster
FROM users
JOIN(
    SELECT people.publicidentifier,people.firstName,people.lastName, people.phoneNumber,people.locationfilter,people.email,people.location,people.companies,people.educations,people.headline,people.summary,people.score,people.relevantExperience,referred_people.addedby,referred_people.addedon, people.forecastedCluster
    FROM referred_people
    JOIN people
    ON people.publicidentifier = referred_people.publicidentifier
    WHERE (LOWER(people.companies) LIKE '%{{Keyword_Experience.text.toLowerCase()}}%' 
        OR LOWER(people.headline) LIKE '%{{Keyword_Headline.text.toLowerCase()}}%' 
        OR LOWER(people.summary) LIKE '%{{Keyword_Summary.text.toLowerCase()}}%' 
				OR LOWER(people.resumeText) LIKE '%{{Keyword_Summary.text.toLowerCase()}}%') 
        AND (LOWER(people.companies) LIKE '%{{Company.text.toLowerCase()}}%') 
        AND (LOWER(people.educations) LIKE '%{{College.text.toLowerCase()}}%') 
    AND (people.forecastedCluster LIKE '%{{Cluster.selectedOptionValue}}%')
		AND (LOWER(people.location) LIKE '%{{Location.text.toLowerCase()}}%')
    AND (people.relevantExperience >{{minExp.text}} AND people.relevantExperience <{{maxExp.text}})
		AND (people.score > 0 OR people.score IS NULL)
		AND ({{Contact.selectedOptionValue}} IS NOT NULL)
    ORDER BY referred_people.addedon ASC
    ) as apple
ON users.uid = apple.addedby
GROUP BY apple.publicidentifier
ORDER BY RAND()
LIMIT 150;

invalids: 'Query timeout' field must be an integer between 0 and 60000
